txt.en: Defeated the watching stone's grip on your mind.
The child looks around slowly before clearing his throat, as if he has uttered not a word in years.\n\n'My doll. I must have my doll returned. It is all I have. Where could it be? Find it, please.'
Completed
The ramshackle dwelling sits in the hills of northern Rath Dúath.\n\nYou should speak to the occupants of the broken-down house.
The toy crumbles to dust in your hand. Within lies a medallion of Sauron
Talk to the strange child
Speak to the occupants of the dwelling
Complete: Rot for the Fire
TBD
Dwelling in the Hills

To your surprise, you spy a small cabin precariously resting in the hills of the Morgul Vale. It looks as if the cabin is occupied by a family, but is that not strange? Men have not lived in the Morgul Vale for many years. Perhaps it is worth investigating this ramshackle cabin and those who dwell there.
A strange family lives in a ramshackle dwelling upon the slopes of the Morgul Vale.
The child's lost toy must be somewhere nearby.\n\nYou should search for the child's toy.
The ramshackle dwelling sits in the hills of eastern Rath Dúath.\n\nYou should speak to the occupants of the dwelling.
The ramshackle dwelling sits in the hills of northern Rath Dúath.\n\nYou should return to the broken-down dwelling to further your investigations.
The child says nothing.
TBD
The ramshackle dwelling sits in the hills of northern Rath Dúath.\n\nYou should speak to the occupants of the dwelling.
Complete: Questionable Meal
Find the child's toy
Return to the ramshackle dwelling

You have overcome the deception of the spirits housed within the forgotten watching-stone. Their purpose remains unknown to you, but you feel certain you must not underestimate the malice of this place.
Defeat the treacherous spirits ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Your vision now clear, you see it was no dwelling at all!
Defeated treacherous spirits ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
